name: Just Another Zombie Apocalypse
description:
This is a no art. Choose your own adventure game. 

This game is made for the game GDKO game jam rounds 3.

Click on the option you want to see and press enter to show all text immediately.

The game is a work in progress and as a result it's a little short, but I hope you enjoy what I have.

(Also special thanks to Amber for help with typos)
